publications.title: Deep Convolutional Networks for Image Classification
publications.abstract: We present a comprehensive study of deep convolutional neural networks applied to large-scale image classification tasks. Our architecture achieves competitive performance on ImageNet dataset with novel regularization techniques.

publications.title: Attention Mechanisms in Neural Machine Translation
publications.abstract: We propose a novel attention-based architecture for neural machine translation that significantly improves translation quality. Our method learns to focus on relevant source tokens when generating each target token.

publications.title: Few-Shot Learning with Meta-Learning
publications.abstract: We introduce a meta-learning approach for few-shot classification that learns to learn from limited examples. Our method achieves state-of-the-art results on miniImageNet and Omniglot benchmarks.

publications.title: Graph Neural Networks for Molecular Property Prediction
publications.abstract: We apply graph neural networks to predict molecular properties with applications in drug discovery. Our approach learns representations that capture both local and global molecular structure.

publications.title: Self-Supervised Learning for Vision Transformers
publications.abstract: We propose a self-supervised pretraining method specifically designed for vision transformers. Our approach leverages contrastive learning and masked image modeling to learn robust visual representations.
